answers.answer: I had my second son at 36 weeks and he is fine.
I had my baby at 38+4. I also had GD. :)

I had my now 15 mth old exactly at 38 weeks and she was perfect with no issues and still is very healthy...she weighed 5lbs 2oz.Due to your current situation of GD and the bt last year....your doctor is very thorough and making the right decision to ensure a healthy and breezy delivery for both you and baby. You two will have a perfect outcome.  Congrats in advance and best wishes!!
Thank u so much. Best wishes for u and your family.
I had my first via csection at 35wks, and if baby can keep baking a bit longer will have this one via csection at 36wks.
I had my twins at 35 weeks csection and they are healthier than ever, everything will be fine good luck

While there is always a risk when choosing an early induction or c-section, 38 weeks is considered full term and risks are weighed carefully by your physician. I am a diabetic and had polyhydramnios, which in itself carries risks to the baby. I had my children at 38w4,38w, and 37w respectively. They were ALL perfect-the earliest even had the best APGARS!!! Good luck to you and baby!

question: Do you think its safe to have a c section @38wks? Is there anyone else on here that had one my doc suggested it because I have gestational diabetes and take  blood thinner injections for a clot I had last year. I'm afraid that the baby will have issues like Cp etc..Im 35.
title: C section @ 38 wks
